content.text:
# Karnataka State Film Award for Best Dialogue

| former name =
| holder_label = Most recent winner
| holder =  Baraguru Ramachandrappa
| award1_type = Total awarded
| award1_winner = 56
| award2_type = First winner
| award2_winner = Subramanya Raj Urs
| award3_type = Last winner
| award3_winner =
| website =
| previous =
| next =
}}
Karnataka State Film Award for Best Dialogue Writer is a state film award of the Indian state of Karnataka  given during the annual Karnataka State Film Awards. The award honors Kannada language films.
Superlative winners
{| class="wikitable sortable"
|P. Lankesh  || 3 Awards
|-
|Chi. Udaya Shankar  Baraguru Ramachandrappa|| 4 Awards
|}
